title: **Nice 3 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment in the heart of the Cleveland**
posting_body: Nice 3 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment in the heart of the Cleveland, OH .Offering an unexpected abundance of outdoor space, this home is fronted by a large shared patio, Offering an unexpected abundance of outdoor space, this home is fronted by a large shared patio, and leads to the show-stopper of a rooftop terrace.
This Newly Painted three Bedroom Apartment is located on a quiet block.

Bedrooms w/closets (can fit king), kitchen incl stove and new refrigerator with room for a bistro or small table, living room, an area for office space or dinette, large closet off kitchen, fully tiled bathroom w/shower.
Rent includes utilities, premium fios cable, wifi and central air.
LOVELY 3 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment in Imperial Co .
Offering an unexpected abundance of outdoor space, this home is fronted by a large shared patio, and leads to the show-stopper of a rooftop terrace with a third-floor wrap-around deck.
Great neighborhood.
Cats OK Dogs with landlord approval.
Recently renovated apartment.
Upper-level unit in a small complex with excellent off-street parking.
No smoking/pets.
Rent includes water, sewer, trash and recycling.
$585 per month.
Off street parking.
Large shared yard space.
Utilities, lawn maintenance and snow removal are the responsibility of the tenant.
Great neighborhood.

and topped with a third-floor wrap-around deck leading to a show-stopper of a roof-top terrace, with built-in planters, an irrigation system, and sweeping views of the Center City skyline and Albany Landing.
